mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WAITINGS (WAITING_IDX,STORE_IDX,WATING_ORDER,USER_IDX,RESERVATION_NUMBER,CDATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(waiting_idx),0) FROM WAITINGS) +1 , #{store_idx}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(wating_order),0) FROM WAITINGS) +1, #{user_idx}, #{reservation_number}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_IDX, U.ID,U.SOCIAL_ID,U.NAME,W.WAITING_IDX, W.STORE_IDX, W.WATING_ORDER, W.STATUS, W.RESERVATION_NUMBER, W.EDATE FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} AND( W.STATUS IN('대기','현재순번')) ORDER BY W.WATING_ORDER
SELECT WAITING_IDX, STORE_IDX, WATING_ORDER, USER_IDX, STATUS, RESERVATION_NUMBER, EDATE FROM WAITINGS WHERE WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx}

SELECT W.WAITING_IDX, W.STORE_IDX, W.WATING_ORDER, W.USER_IDX, W.STATUS, W.RESERVATION_NUMBER, W.EDATE, S.TITLE, W.CDATE FROM WAITINGS W JOIN STORES S ON W.STORE_IDX =S.STORE_IDX WHERE W.USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND (W.STATUS='대기' OR W.STATUS='현재순번')

SELECT W.WAITING_IDX, W.STORE_IDX, W.WATING_ORDER, W.USER_IDX, W.STATUS, W.RESERVATION_NUMBER, W.EDATE, S.TITLE, W.CDATE FROM WAITINGS W JOIN STORES S ON W.STORE_IDX =S.STORE_IDX WHERE W.USER_IDX = #{user_idx}

SELECT RU.RESERVATION_IDX, RU.USER_IDX, RU.STATUS, RU.RESERVATION_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(RU.CDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CDATE, RU.RP_IDX, '20'||TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(RU.reservation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YY-MM-DD') AS RESERVATION_DATE, RU.STORE_IDX, S.TITLE, TO_CHAR(RP.start_time, 'HH24:MI') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(RP.end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS TIME_SLOT FROM RESERVATION_USERS RU JOIN STORES S ON RU.STORE_IDX = S.STORE_IDX JOIN RESERVATION_PLANS RP ON RP.RP_IDX =RU.RP_IDX WHERE USER_IDX =#{user_idx}

SELECT W.WAITING_IDX, W.STORE_IDX, W.WATING_ORDER, W.USER_IDX, W.STATUS, W.RESERVATION_NUMBER, W.EDATE, W.CDATE, S.TITLE FROM WAITINGS W JOIN STORES S ON W.STORE_IDX = S.STORE_IDX WHERE W.USER_IDX =#{user_idx} AND ( W.STATUS ='예약취소' OR W.STATUS ='노쇼' OR W.STATUS ='현장방문' )
SELECT WAITING_IDX FROM WAITINGS WHERE USER_IDX =#{user_idx} AND (STATUS ='대기' OR STATUS ='현재순번')
SELECT EDATE, CDATE FROM WAITINGS WHERE STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} AND STATUS = '현장방문' AND TRUNC(TO_DATE(CDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT DISTINCT RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n AS RESERVATION_DATE, RD.RD_IDX, RD.PLAN, RP.RP_IDX, RS.STORE_IDX, TO_CHAR(RP.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(RP.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS TIME_RANGE, RP.MAX_NUMBER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n ORDER BY TO_CHAR(RP.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI')) || '차' AS TIME_SLOT FROM RESERVATION_DATES RD JOIN ( SELECT LEVEL - 1 AS n FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 32 ) n ON RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n <= RD.RESERVATION_END_DATE JOIN RESERVATION_PLANS RP ON RD.PLAN = RP.PLAN JOIN RESERVATION_STORES RS ON RS.RS_IDX = RD.RS_IDX WHERE RS.STORE_IDX = #{store_idx}

SELECT DISTINCT RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n AS RESERVATION_DATE, RD.RD_IDX, RD.PLAN, RS.STORE_IDX FROM RESERVATION_DATES RD JOIN ( SELECT LEVEL - 1 AS n FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 32 ) n ON RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n <= RD.RESERVATION_END_DATE JOIN RESERVATION_STORES RS ON RS.RS_IDX = RD.RS_IDX WHERE RS.STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} ORDER BY RESERVATION_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_USERS ( RESERVATION_IDX, USER_IDX, RESERVATION_NUMBER, RP_IDX, RESERVATION_DATE,STORE_IDX ) VALUES (RESERVATION_USERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{user_idx},#{reservation_number},#{rp_idx},#{reservation_date},#{store_idx})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX_NUMBER , SUM(RU.RESERVATION_NUMBER) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n AS RESERVATION_DATE, RD.RD_IDX, RD.PLAN, RP.RP_IDX, RS.STORE_IDX, TO_CHAR(RP.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(RP.END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS TIME_RANGE, RP.MAX_NUMBER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n ORDER BY TO_CHAR(RP.START_TIME, 'HH24:MI')) || '차' AS TIME_SLOT FROM RESERVATION_DATES RD JOIN ( SELECT LEVEL - 1 AS n FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 32 ) n ON RD.RESERVATION_START_DATE + n.n <= RD.RESERVATION_END_DATE JOIN RESERVATION_PLANS RP ON RD.PLAN = RP.PLAN JOIN RESERVATION_STORES RS ON RS.RS_IDX = RD.RS_IDX WHERE RS.STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} )X JOIN RESERVATION_USERS RU ON RU.RP_IDX = X.RP_IDX AND RU.RESERVATION_DATE = X.RESERVATION_DATE WHERE X.RESERVATION_DATE = TO_DATE(#{reservation_date}, 'YY/MM/DD') AND X.RP_IDX = #{rp_idx} AND RU.STATUS ='예약완료' GROUP BY X.RESERVATION_DATE,X.RP_IDX ,X.TIME_RANGE,MAX_NUMBER

SELECT RU.RESERVATION_IDX, RU.USER_IDX, RU.STATUS, RU.RESERVATION_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(RU.CDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CDATE, RU.RP_IDX, '20'||TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(RU.reservation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YY-MM-DD') AS RESERVATION_DATE, RU.STORE_IDX, S.TITLE, TO_CHAR(RP.start_time, 'HH24:MI') || ' - ' || TO_CHAR(RP.end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS TIME_SLOT FROM RESERVATION_USERS RU JOIN STORES S ON RU.STORE_IDX = S.STORE_IDX JOIN RESERVATION_PLANS RP ON RP.RP_IDX =RU.RP_IDX WHERE RU.RESERVATION_IDX = #{reservation_idx}

SELECT WU.STATUS ,WU.WAITING_IDX , WU.WATING_ORDER , WU.STORE_IDX , COUNT(W.WAITING_IDX) AS TOTAL FROM(SELECT STATUS ,WAITING_IDX , WATING_ORDER , STORE_IDX FROM WAITINGS WHERE WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx}) WU JOIN WAITINGS W ON WU.STORE_IDX = W.STORE_IDX WHERE W.STATUS ='대기' GROUP BY WU.STATUS , WU.WAITING_IDX , WU.WATING_ORDER , WU.STORE_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POPCORN_LOG ( LOG_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, CONTENT_INFO, SPENT_POINTS, TOTAL_POINTS ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(LOG_ID),0) FROM POPCORN_LOG) + 1 , (SELECT U.ID FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx}), '순번미루기', '사용', 200, (SELECT PW.TOTAL_POINTS - 200 AS TOTAL_POINTS FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX JOIN POPCORN_WALLET PW ON PW.USER_ID = U.ID WHERE WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx}) )

INSERT INTO POPCORN_LOG ( LOG_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, CONTENT_INFO, SPENT_POINTS, TOTAL_POINTS ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(LOG_ID),0) FROM POPCORN_LOG) + 1 , (SELECT U.ID FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx}), '스토어예약 노쇼', '차감', 500, (SELECT PW.TOTAL_POINTS - 500 AS TOTAL_POINTS FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX JOIN POPCORN_WALLET PW ON PW.USER_ID = U.ID WHERE WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx}) )
mapper.update: UPDATE POPCORN_WALLET PW SET PW.TOTAL_POINTS = PW.TOTAL_POINTS - 500 WHERE PW.USER_ID IN ( SELECT U.ID FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE W.WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx} )
UPDATE POPCORN_WALLET PW SET PW.TOTAL_POINTS = PW.TOTAL_POINTS - 200 WHERE PW.USER_ID IN ( SELECT U.ID FROM WAITINGS W JOIN USERS U ON W.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE W.WAITING_IDX = #{waiting_idx} )
